system.description: This is any 1' to 2' long piece of wood, its head sometimes covered with an inflammable substance such as pitch. It casts light in a 30' radius and burns for one hour (six turns). See the description from the Weapons Table for information on using a torch as a weapon; clerics can use it as a weapon.

It casts light in a 30' radius and burns for one hour (six turns). See the description from the Weapons Table for information on using a torch as a weapon; clerics can use it as a weapon.
